stimulusHtml: The sculptural program on the stairs leading to the apadana reflect the function of the Audience Hall as the seat of the Persian king by depicting

features.html: © Gérard Degeorge / Corbis

choicesHtml: an important deity handing the insignias of law and authority to the king to demonstrate his legitimacy to rule over the empire
a mythological battle between gods and monsters to underscore the role of the king as protector of civilization against barbarism
foreign representatives in various regional attire carrying offerings to represent the many subjugated peoples who paid tribute to the empire
portraits of the king combined with the bodies of mythological creatures to show the divine nature of the king as a living god
